text: Now’s the perfect time to discover another side of Britain. A side where you experience fresh perspectives of our diverse cities, uncover modern twists on our historic icons, and where our green spaces are full of unexpected gems. Whether it’s kayaking under Tower Bridge by moonlight, getting the inside scoop on Manchester's foodie scene, or laughing along at the 75th anniversary of the Edinburgh Fringe, Britain is bursting with opportunities to explore different every day. Reconnect with friends over eccentric takes on afternoon tea. Venture to new heights on Brighton’s south coast, or get a taste for how Cardiff’s chefs are transforming traditional Welsh delicacies. From cheering on world class sport in the West Midlands and championing creativity across Britain with Unboxed, we welcome you to join us for an unmissable year of celebration.
title: VisitBritain
